dict.string: Sonora needs microphone access to record voice memos. Your recordings stay private on your device until you choose to transcribe them using AI.
Sonora can add detected events from your voice memos directly to your calendar for better organization.
Sonora needs full calendar access to check for conflicts and suggest the best calendar for your events.
Sonora can create reminders from your voice memos to help you stay on top of important tasks.
